infoTextForCook: Around 58% of emissions stem from fish feed production. Salmon has got the highest impacts for transport due to a longer distance and re-frigeration. Feed conversion ratio differ per species of salmon and feed. Feed conversion ratio in Norway 1.1 in UK 1.33, Canada 1.31, Chili 1.5. Due to fish feed and secondary dinitrogen oxide emissions formed from nitrogen compounds, farmed salmon is more environmentally harmful than high-sea fish products
name: Lachs
